useCase.name: Access System and Select Language
useCase.description: User accesses the VoxMeteo Sahel System and selects a language for interaction.

preconditions.precondition: User has a device capable of making calls.

successEndConditions.condition: User successfully selects a language for interaction.

failureEndConditions.condition: User fails to select a language for interaction.

mainSequence.step: System greets the user and prompts to select a language.
User selects a language (1 for English, 2 for French, 3 for local languages).
User navigates to the Main Menu after language selection.
